comment.author: 43688219@N00
comment._content: Another one with no obvious Medal Index Card at the National Archive. There is however an Ulric William Adams held under reference WO 372/1/19040. He was initially a Second Lieutenant, then an Inspector of Ordnance Machinery, then Captain and finally Major, all in the Royal Army Ordnance Corps. discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/SearchUI/Details?uri=D1... There is also a William Henry Adams,whose card is under WO 372/1/19896. He was a Major and then a Lieutenant Colonel in the RAOC. discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/SearchUI/Details?uri=D1...
